item.title: Jacki add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "The Chinese use two brush strokes to write the word 'crisis.' One brush stroke stands for danger; the other for opportunity. In a crisis, be aware of the danger--but recognize the opportunity." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Shelby Foote
item.description: "A university is just a group of buildings gathered around a library." -- Shelby Foote

item.title: Jacki add a quote by John Burroughs
item.description: "The lure of the distant and the difficult is deceptive. The great opportunity is where you are." -- John Burroughs

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Frances Hodgson Burnett
item.description: "Two things cannot be in one place. Where you tend a rose, my lad, a thistle cannot grow." -- Frances Hodgson Burnett

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Don't tell me the moon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "If you are allergic to a thing, it is best not to put that thing in your mouth, particularly if the thing is cats." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Sean O'Casey
item.description: "When it was dark, you always carried the sun in your hand for me." -- Sean O'Casey

item.title: Jacki add a quote by James Branch Cabell
item.description: "The optimist proclaims that we live in the best of all possible worlds; and the pessimist fears this is true." -- James Branch Cabell

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Anthony Trollope
item.description: "A small daily task, if it be really daily, will beat the labours of a spasmodic Hercules." -- Anthony Trollope

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Happiness consists in getting enough sleep. Just that, nothing more." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Jacki add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Poets have been mysteriously silent on the subject of cheese." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Leo Rosten
item.description: "O, to be sure, we laugh less and play less and wear uncomfortable disguises like adults, but beneath the costume is the child we always are, whose needs are simple, whose daily life is still best described by fairy tales." -- Leo Rosten

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
Jacki add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Heather Dixon
item.description: "Down with tyranny!' Bramble cried. 'Aristocracy! Autocracy! Monocracy! Other ocracy things! You are outnumbered, sir! <i>Surrender</i>!" -- Heather Dixon

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "I have never listened to anyone who criticized my taste in space travel, sideshows or gorillas. When this occurs, I pack up my dinosaurs and leave the room." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Everybody has a secret world inside of them. I mean everybody. All of the people in the whole world, I mean everybody — no matter how dull and boring they are on the outside. Inside them they've all got unimaginable, magnificent, wonderful, stupid, amazing worlds... Not just one world. Hundreds of them. Thousands, maybe." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Bei Dao
item.description: "In the world I am Always a stranger I do not understand its language It does not understand my silence" -- Bei Dao

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Doris Lessing
item.description: "What's terrible is to pretend that second-rate is first-rate. To pretend that you don't need love when you do; or you like your work when you know quite well you're capable of better." -- Doris Lessing

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Kathi Appelt
item.description: "Nosotros somos paisanos. We are fellow countrymen. We come from the same soil." -- Kathi Appelt

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Kathi Appelt
item.description: "They say that lightning never strikes in the same place twice, but the same is not true for courage. As it turns out, when courage strikes, it almost always begets more courage." -- Kathi Appelt

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Haruki Marukami
item.description: "Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting." -- Haruki Marukami

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Clare Vanderpool
item.description: "And in the background of Early's story was her voice. Her soul. Her sadness and longing. Because when it's raining, it's always Billie Holiday. p. 81" -- Clare Vanderpool

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Clare Vanderpool
item.description: "But my mom shook her head at him and said to me, "Yes, you made your bed, but for heaven's sakes, don't just lie in it!" -- Clare Vanderpool

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Clare Vanderpool
item.description: "Still, the question remained. Was he straitjacket strange or just go-off-by-yourself-at-recess-and-put-bugs-in-your-nose strange?" -- Clare Vanderpool

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "As we continued upward, I thought about how adults sometimes complain that kids only think about ourselves, but it’s not true. We care a lot about other people, but most times, we don’t have the power to change things for them." -- Anonymous

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Steve Wozniak
item.description: "If you love what you do and are willing to do what it takes, it's within your reach. And it'll be worth every minute you spend alone at night, thinking and thinking about what it is you want to design or build. It'll be worth it, I promise." -- Steve Wozniak

item.title: Jacki add a quote by Ben Okri
item.description: "Stories can conquer fear, you know. They can make the heart bigger." -- Ben Okri
